situation: H was upset when his story time was moved to the afternoon instead of its usual morning slot. He sat under the table refusing to come out.
action: The TA coaxed H out with a lollipop without discussing the change or addressing his feelings about the schedule disruption.
effect: H complied temporarily but remained agitated after the bribery wore off, showing prolonged negative behavior throughout the day.
topic: Routine Disruptions - Changes in daily schedule or expected activities
